Sentencas: Four kinds of nickel oxide powder with different microstructure were used as the anode materials for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide microstructure on the performance of Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The microstructure of the powders was evaluated using scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide microstructure on the performance of Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The performance of the anode-supported SOFCs was investigated through measuring and analyzing the current-voltage characteristics, electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS) and microstructure images.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide microstructure on the performance of Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: It was found that the performance of a Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFC depends strongly upon the anode microstructure which is decided by the characteristics of nickel oxide powder.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide microstructure on the performance of Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The highest SOFC performance was obtained from the cell with the finest nickel oxide powder synthesized by glycine-nitrate combustion method while the lowest performance was with the coarsest powder purchased from a general chemical supplier.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide microstructure on the performance of Ni-YSZ anode-supported SOFCs
